name: printenv
shortDescription: print all or part of environment
longDescription: Print  the values of the specified environment VARIABLE(s).  If no VARIABLE is specified, print name and value pairs for them all.

options.name: null
options.description: Output a zero byte (ASCII NUL) at the end of each line, rather than a newline.  This option enables other programs to parse the output even when that output would contain data with embedded newlines.
